birth_place.zh-cn: 大明北直隶顺天府紫禁城
birth_place.en: Forbidden City, Shuntian Prefecture, North Zhili, Ming Dynasty

death_place.zh-cn: 大明北直隶顺天府紫禁城干清宫
death_place.en: Qianqing Palace, Forbidden City, Shuntian Prefecture, North Zhili, Ming Dynasty

description.zh-cn: 明朝第九位皇帝，明宪宗第三子，年号弘治。在位期间恭俭有制，勤政爱民，任用贤臣，开创了“弘治中兴”的局面，是明朝中期广受后世称赞的君主。他也是中国历史上唯一一位终身只有一位皇后的皇帝。
description.en: The ninth emperor of the Ming Dynasty, the third son of the Chenghua Emperor, with the era name Hongzhi. During his reign, he was known for his diligence, frugality, and love for his people. He appointed virtuous officials, initiating the 'Hongzhi Restoration', and is widely praised by later generations as an exemplary ruler of the mid-Ming dynasty. He is also the only emperor in Chinese history to have had only one empress throughout his life.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第八位皇帝，明孝宗朱祐樘之父。在位后期重用宦官和奸佞，造成政治混乱。
description.en: The eighth emperor of the Ming Dynasty, father of the Hongzhi Emperor Zhu Youtang. In his later reign, he heavily relied on eunuchs and corrupt officials, leading to political chaos.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第十位皇帝，明孝宗朱祐樘长子。
description.en: The tenth emperor of the Ming Dynasty, the eldest son of the Hongzhi Emperor Zhu Youtang.

description.zh-cn: 明宪宗妃，明孝宗朱祐樘生母。据载其在明孝宗被立为太子后暴薨。
description.en: A consort of the Chenghua Emperor and the birth mother of the Hongzhi Emperor Zhu Youtang. It is recorded that she died suddenly after her son was made crown prince.

description.zh-cn: 明孝宗的唯一皇后，明武宗朱厚照生母。
description.en: The only empress of the Hongzhi Emperor and the birth mother of the Zhengde Emperor Zhu Houzhao.

description.zh-cn: 明孝宗次子，早夭。
description.en: The second son of the Hongzhi Emperor, who died in infancy.

description.zh-cn: 明孝宗在位期间，因其励精图治、整肃朝纲、任用贤能，使明朝政治清明、经济繁荣的社会局面。
description.en: A period during the reign of the Hongzhi Emperor characterized by political stability, economic prosperity, and effective governance, resulting from his diligent rule and employment of capable officials.

description.zh-cn: 明宪宗的宠妃，据说曾迫害过明孝宗及其生母。
description.en: The favorite consort of the Chenghua Emperor, who is said to have persecuted the Hongzhi Emperor and his birth mother.

description.zh-cn: 明英宗皇后，明宪宗之母。曾在明孝宗幼年时将其接入宫中抚养。
description.en: Empress of the Yingzong Emperor and mother of the Chenghua Emperor. She took the young Hongzhi Emperor into her palace and raised him.

description.zh-cn: 明宪宗的废后。据载其被废后，曾帮助哺育年幼的明孝宗，使其得以保全。
description.en: The deposed empress of the Chenghua Emperor. It is recorded that after her deposition, she helped nurse the young Hongzhi Emperor, ensuring his survival.

description.zh-cn: 明朝大学士。在明孝宗被立为太子一事上起到了推动作用。
description.en: A Grand Secretary of the Ming Dynasty. He played a promotional role in the establishment of the Hongzhi Emperor as crown prince.

description.zh-cn: 明朝名臣。明孝宗为其建祠平反。
description.en: A famous official of the Ming Dynasty. The Hongzhi Emperor built a shrine for him and posthumously cleared his name.

description.zh-cn: 明孝宗时期的内阁首辅大臣，被倚为重臣，但后期也曾批评皇帝。
description.en: The Senior Grand Secretary during the Hongzhi Emperor's reign. He was a trusted key minister but later also criticized the emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明孝宗时期的内阁大臣，一代名臣。
description.en: A Grand Secretary during the Hongzhi Emperor's reign, a renowned official of his generation.

description.zh-cn: 明孝宗时期的内阁大臣，一代名臣，曾直言弘治后期的弊政。
description.en: A Grand Secretary during the Hongzhi Emperor's reign, a renowned official of his generation, who frankly pointed out the malpractices of the later Hongzhi era.

description.zh-cn: 明孝宗时期的重臣，曾负责治理黄河和整顿军事。后因对时政不满而请辞。
description.en: A key minister during the Hongzhi Emperor's reign, responsible for managing the Yellow River and reorganizing the military. He later resigned due to dissatisfaction with the political situation.

description.zh-cn: 明朝的一部行政法典，于弘治十五年（1502年）编成。
description.en: An administrative code of the Ming Dynasty, compiled in 1502 during the Hongzhi era.

description.zh-cn: 明孝宗的妻弟（小舅子）。明孝宗对其纵容，曾一次性赏赐大量土地。
description.en: The younger brother of Empress Zhang, brother-in-law of the Hongzhi Emperor. The emperor indulged him, once granting him a vast amount of land.

description.zh-cn: 明宪宗时期的宦官，被明孝宗即位后惩处。
description.en: A eunuch during the Chenghua Emperor's reign who was punished by the Hongzhi Emperor after he ascended the throne.

description.zh-cn: 明宪宗时期的礼部右侍郎，被明孝宗即位后惩处。
description.en: The Right Vice Minister of Rites during the Chenghua Emperor's reign, who was punished by the Hongzhi Emperor after he ascended the throne.

description.zh-cn: 明宪宗时期的僧人，因罪大恶极被明孝宗下令斩杀。
description.en: A monk during the Chenghua Emperor's reign who was executed by order of the Hongzhi Emperor for his heinous crimes.

description.zh-cn: 明朝太学生。因上书力谏明孝宗停止建造棕棚，后被授官。
description.en: An Imperial University student of the Ming Dynasty. He was appointed as an official after submitting a memorial strongly advising the Hongzhi Emperor to halt the construction of a palm pavilion.

description.zh-cn: 明朝时期对蒙古各部的称呼。弘治年间曾大举入侵明朝边境。
description.en: A term used during the Ming Dynasty to refer to various Mongol tribes. They launched a major invasion of the Ming border during the Hongzhi era.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个朝代，由朱元璋建立。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history founded by Zhu Yuanzhang.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第六位和第八位皇帝，明宪宗之父，明孝宗的祖父。
description.en: The sixth and eighth emperor of the Ming Dynasty, father of the Chenghua Emperor and grandfather of the Hongzhi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第五位皇帝，明英宗之父，明孝宗的曾祖父。
description.en: The fifth emperor of the Ming Dynasty, father of Emperor Yingzong and great-grandfather of the Hongzhi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第四位皇帝，明宣宗之父，明孝宗的高祖父。
description.en: The fourth emperor of the Ming Dynasty, father of the Xuande Emperor and great-great-grandfather of the Hongzhi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明孝宗朱祐樘是明宪宗朱见深的第三子。
description.en: The Hongzhi Emperor Zhu Youtang was the third son of the Chenghua Emperor Zhu Jianshen.

description.zh-cn: 明孝宗朱祐樘的生母是纪淑妃（追谥孝穆皇后）。
description.en: The birth mother of the Hongzhi Emperor Zhu Youtang was Consort Ji (posthumously honored as Empress Xiaomu).

description.zh-cn: 明孝宗一生只娶了孝康敬皇后张氏一位妻子，没有其他妃嫔。
description.en: Throughout his life, the Hongzhi Emperor married only one wife, Empress Xiaokangjing (née Zhang), and had no other concubines.

description.zh-cn: 明武宗朱厚照是明孝宗的长子和继任者。
description.en: The Zhengde Emperor Zhu Houzhao was the eldest son and successor of the Hongzhi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 朱厚炜是明孝宗的次子，早夭。
description.en: Zhu Houwei was the second son of the Hongzhi Emperor and died in infancy.

description.zh-cn: 明孝宗在位期间励精图治，任用贤臣，开创了政治清明、经济繁荣的“弘治中兴”局面。
description.en: During his reign, the Hongzhi Emperor governed diligently and appointed capable officials, creating a period of political stability and economic prosperity known as the 'Hongzhi Restoration'.

description.zh-cn: 根据记载，万贵妃在明孝宗幼年时曾试图加害于他，导致其需被藏匿抚养。
description.en: According to records, Consort Wan attempted to harm the Hongzhi Emperor during his childhood, forcing him to be raised in hiding.

description.zh-cn: 明孝宗的身份被明宪宗知晓后，由其祖母周太后（孝肃皇后）接入宫中抚养。
description.en: After his identity was revealed to the Chenghua Emperor, the Hongzhi Emperor was brought into the palace to be raised by his grandmother, Empress Dowager Zhou (Empress Xiaosu).

description.zh-cn: 明宪宗的废后吴氏在明孝宗幼年时曾帮助哺育他，保全其生命。
description.en: The deposed Empress Wu of the Chenghua Emperor helped nurse the young Hongzhi Emperor, saving his life.

description.zh-cn: 大学士商辂等人请求明宪宗将朱祐樘立为皇太子。
description.en: Grand Secretary Shang Lu and others requested the Chenghua Emperor to establish Zhu Youtang as the crown prince.

description.zh-cn: 明孝宗为前朝名臣于谦建立祠堂，为其平反昭雪。
description.en: The Hongzhi Emperor built a memorial shrine for the famous former official Yu Qian, posthumously rehabilitating his reputation.

description.zh-cn: 刘健是弘治朝的重臣，受到皇帝的信用。后期他也曾批评皇帝的懈怠和浪费。
description.en: Liu Jian was a key minister during the Hongzhi reign and was trusted by the emperor. In the later years, he also criticized the emperor's laxity and extravagance.

description.zh-cn: 谢迁是弘治朝的重臣，与刘健、李东阳等人共辅朝政。
description.en: Xie Qian was a key minister during the Hongzhi reign, assisting in governance alongside Liu Jian and Li Dongyang.

description.zh-cn: 李东阳是弘治朝的重臣，后期曾直言国家财政困难、民生困苦等问题。
description.en: Li Dongyang was a key minister during the Hongzhi reign who, in the later years, spoke frankly about issues such as national financial difficulties and the hardship of the people.

description.zh-cn: 刘大夏在弘治朝被委以重任，曾治理黄河，后升任兵部尚书负责军事整顿。
description.en: Liu Daxia was entrusted with significant responsibilities during the Hongzhi reign, including managing the Yellow River, and was later promoted to Minister of War to oversee military reorganization.

description.zh-cn: 《大明会典》在明孝宗的支持下于弘治十五年编纂完成。
description.en: The 'Collected Statutes of the Great Ming' was compiled and completed in the 15th year of the Hongzhi era with the support of the Hongzhi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明孝宗纵容外戚，曾赐予其妻弟张延龄大量田地。
description.en: The Hongzhi Emperor indulged his consort's relatives, once granting his brother-in-law Zhang Yanling a vast amount of land.

description.zh-cn: 明孝宗即位后，严厉惩处了前朝宦官梁芳等奸佞之臣。
description.en: After ascending the throne, the Hongzhi Emperor severely punished corrupt officials from the previous reign, including the eunuch Liang Fang.

description.zh-cn: 明孝宗即位后，严厉惩处了前朝礼部右侍郎李孜省等奸佞之臣。
description.en: After ascending the throne, the Hongzhi Emperor severely punished corrupt officials from the previous reign, including the Right Vice Minister of Rites, Li Zisheng.

description.zh-cn: 明孝宗下令斩杀了罪大恶极的僧人继晓。
description.en: The Hongzhi Emperor ordered the execution of the monk Jixiao for his heinous crimes.

description.zh-cn: 太学生虎臣上书力谏，反对明孝宗建造万寿山棕棚的计划。
description.en: Imperial University student Hu Chen submitted a memorial to strongly advise against the Hongzhi Emperor's plan to build a palm pavilion on Wanshou Hill.

description.zh-cn: 明孝宗采纳了虎臣的谏言，取消了工程，并授予他官职。
description.en: The Hongzhi Emperor accepted Hu Chen's advice, canceled the construction project, and appointed him to an official position.

description.zh-cn: 1501年，鞑靼部落以十万骑兵入侵明朝固原、宁夏境内，对边防造成严重威胁。
description.en: In 1501, Tatar tribes invaded the Ming territories of Guyuan and Ningxia with 100,000 cavalry, posing a serious threat to the border defense.

description.zh-cn: 明宪宗是明英宗朱祁镇的儿子。
description.en: The Chenghua Emperor was the son of Emperor Yingzong of Ming, Zhu Qizhen.

description.zh-cn: 明英宗是明宣宗朱瞻基的儿子。
description.en: Emperor Yingzong of Ming was the son of the Xuande Emperor, Zhu Zhanji.

description.zh-cn: 明宣宗是明仁宗朱高炽的儿子。
description.en: The Xuande Emperor was the son of the Hongxi Emperor, Zhu Gaochi.
